verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יַכְרִ֞ית <WH3772> hath cut off יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> whose land וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֕ם <WH3423> thee and thou succeedest וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֥ <WH3427> them and dwellest בְעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5892> in their cities וּבְבָתֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH1004> and in their houses

שָׁל֥וֹשׁ <WH7969> three עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> cities תַּבְדִּ֣יל <WH914> Thou shalt separate לָ֑ךְ בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> for thee in the midst אַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> of thy land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> thee to possess

תָּכִ֣ין <WH3559> Thou shalt prepare לְךָ֮ הַדֶּרֶךְ֒ <WH1870> thee a way וְשִׁלַּשְׁתָּ֙ <WH8027> into three parts אֶת־ <WH853> גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> and divide the coasts אַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> of thy land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יַנְחִֽילְךָ֖ <WH5157> giveth thee to inherit יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> become לָנ֥וּס <WH5127> may flee שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there כָּל־ <WH3605> any רֹצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> that every slayer

וְזֶה֙ <WH2088> now this דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> And this [is] the case הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> of the slayer אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָנ֥וּס <WH5127> which shall flee שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there וָחָ֑י <WH2425> thither that he may live אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when יַכֶּ֤ה <WH5221> Whoso killeth אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> his neighbour בִּבְלִי־ <WH1097> corruption דַ֔עַת <WH1847> cunning וְה֛וּא <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> not שֹׂנֵ֥א <WH8130> whom he hated ל֖וֹ מִתְּמֹ֥ל <WH8543> not in time שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <WH8032> past

וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> when יָבֹ֨א <WH935> As when a man goeth אֶת־ <WH854> with רֵעֵ֥הוּ <WH7453> with his neighbour בַיַּעַר֮ <WH3293> into the wood לַחְטֹ֣ב <WH2404> to hew עֵצִים֒ <WH6086> wood וְנִדְּחָ֨ה <WH5080> fetcheth a stroke יָד֤וֹ <WH3027> and his hand בַגַּרְזֶן֙ <WH1631> with the axe לִכְרֹ֣ת <WH3772> to cut down הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> the tree וְנָשַׁ֤ל <WH5394> slippeth הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> and the head מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> from the helve וּמָצָ֥א <WH4672> and lighteth אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> upon his neighbour וָמֵ֑ת <WH4191> that he die ה֗וּא <WH1931> he יָנ֛וּס <WH5127> he shall flee אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחַ֥ת <WH259> unto one הֶעָרִים־ <WH5892> of those cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these וָחָֽי׃ <WH2425> and live

פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise יִרְדֹּף֩ <WH7291> pursue גֹּאֵ֨ל <WH1350> Lest the avenger הַדָּ֜ם <WH1818> of the blood אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after that הָרֹצֵ֗חַ <WH7523> the manslayer כִּי־ <WH3588> while יֵחַם֮ <WH3179> is hot לְבָבוֹ֒ <WH3824> his heart וְהִשִּׂיג֛וֹ <WH5381> and overtake כִּֽי־ <WH3588> inasmuch as יִרְבֶּ֥ה <WH7235> is long הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> him because the way וְהִכָּ֣הוּ <WH5221> and slay נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> him וְלוֹ֙ אֵ֣ין <WH369> was not מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> whereas he [was] not worthy מָ֔וֶת <WH4194> of death כִּ֠י <WH3588> since לֹ֣א <WH3808> had not שֹׂנֵ֥א <WH8130> he hated ה֛וּא <WH1931> he ל֖וֹ מִתְּמ֥וֹל <WH8543> him not in time שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> past

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> Wherefore I command לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> thee saying שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> cities תַּבְדִּ֥יל <WH914> Thou shalt separate לָֽךְ׃ ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> If יַרְחִ֞יב <WH7337> enlarge יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And if the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבֻ֣לְךָ֔ <WH1366> thy coast כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <WH7650> as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers וְנָ֤תַן <WH5414> and give לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> thee all the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> which he promised לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> unto thy fathers

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if תִשְׁמֹר֩ <WH8104> If thou shalt keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוָ֨ה <WH4687> all these commandments הַזֹּ֜את <WH2063> you לַעֲשֹׂתָ֗הּ <WH6213> to do אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֮ <WH6680> them which I command הַיּוֹם֒ <WH3117> thee this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <WH157> to love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֧ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God וְלָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> walk בִּדְרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> in his ways כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> ever וְיָסַפְתָּ֨ <WH3254> then shalt thou add לְךָ֥ עוֹד֙ <WH5750> more שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> cities עַ֖ל <WH5921> besides הַשָּׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> more for thee beside these three הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִשָּׁפֵךְ֙ <WH8210> be not shed דָּ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֔י <WH5355> That innocent בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> in אַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> thy land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and דָּמִֽים׃ <WH1818> and [so] blood ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> if יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> is a אִישׁ֙ <WH376> But if any man שֹׂנֵ֣א <WH8130> hate לְרֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour וְאָ֤רַב <WH693> and lie in wait לוֹ֙ וְקָ֣ם <WH6965> for him and rise up עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against וְהִכָּ֥הוּ <WH5221> against him and smite נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> him mortally וָמֵ֑ת <WH4191> that he die וְנָ֕ס <WH5127> and fleeth אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחַ֖ת <WH259> into one הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities הָאֵֽל׃ <WH411> of these

וְשָֽׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> shall send זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> Then the elders עִיר֔וֹ <WH5892> of his city וְלָקְח֥וּ <WH3947> and fetch אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְנָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> him thence and deliver אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> בְּיַ֛ד <WH3027> him into the hand גֹּאֵ֥ל <WH1350> of the avenger הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> of blood וָמֵֽת׃ <WH4191> that he may die

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָח֥וֹס <WH2347> shall not pity עֵֽינְךָ֖ <WH5869> Thine eye עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֧ <WH1197> him but thou shalt put away דַֽם־ <WH1818> blood הַנָּקִ֛י <WH5355> [the guilt of] innocent מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> from Israel וְט֥וֹב <WH2896> good לָֽךְ׃ ס

לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תַסִּיג֙ <WH5253> Thou shalt not remove גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> landmark רֵֽעֲךָ֔ <WH7453> thy neighbour's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which גָּבְל֖וּ <WH1379> have set רִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <WH7223> which they of old time בְּנַחֲלָֽתְךָ֙ <WH5159> in thine inheritance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּנְחַ֔ל <WH5157> which thou shalt inherit בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> thee to possess ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יָקוּם֩ <WH6965> shall not rise up עֵ֨ד <WH5707> witness אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> One בְּאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> against a man לְכָל־ <WH3605> of any עָוֹן֙ <WH5771> for any iniquity וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> any חַטָּ֔את <WH2403> or for any sin בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any חֵ֖טְא <WH2399> in any sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יֶֽחֱטָ֑א <WH2398> that he sinneth עַל־ <WH5921> on פִּ֣י ׀ <WH6310> at the mouth שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> of two עֵדִ֗ים <WH5707> witnesses א֛וֹ <WH176> or עַל־ <WH5921> on פִּ֥י <WH6310> or at the mouth שְׁלֹשָֽׁה־ <WH7969> of three עֵדִ֖ים <WH5707> witnesses יָק֥וּם <WH6965> be established דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> shall the matter

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יָק֥וּם <WH6965> rise up עֵד־ <WH5707> witness חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> If a false בְּאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> against any man לַעֲנ֥וֹת <WH6030> to testify בּ֖וֹ סָרָֽה׃ <WH5627> against him [that which is] wrong

וְעָמְד֧וּ <WH5975> [is] shall stand שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> Then both הָאֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH376> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who לָהֶ֥ם <WH1992> those הָרִ֖יב <WH7379> between whom the controversy לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> the priests וְהַשֹּׁ֣פְטִ֔ים <WH8199> and the judges אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become בַּיָּמִ֥ים <WH3117> which shall be in those days הָהֵֽם׃ <WH1992> those

וְדָרְשׁ֥וּ <WH1875> inquisition הַשֹּׁפְטִ֖ים <WH8199> And the judges הֵיטֵ֑ב <WH3190> shall make diligent וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and if עֵֽד־ <WH5707> and behold [if] the witness שֶׁ֙קֶר֙ <WH8267> [be] a false הָעֵ֔ד <WH5707> witness שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> falsely עָנָ֥ה <WH6030> [and] hath testified בְאָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> against his brother

וַעֲשִׂ֣יתֶם <WH6213> Then shall ye do ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he זָמַ֖ם <WH2161> unto him as he had thought לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to have done לְאָחִ֑יו <WH251> unto his brother וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> from among

וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <WH7604> And those which remain יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> shall hear וְיִרָ֑אוּ <WH3372> and fear וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and will never יֹסִ֨פוּ <WH3254> and shall henceforth לַעֲשׂ֜וֹת <WH6213> commit ע֗וֹד <WH5750> again כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> no more any הָרָ֛ע <WH7451> such evil הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> such בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> among

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תָח֖וֹס <WH2347> shall not pity עֵינֶ֑ךָ <WH5869> And thine eye נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> [but] life בְּנֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> [shall go] for life עַ֤יִן <WH5869> eye בְּעַ֙יִן֙ <WH5869> for eye שֵׁ֣ן <WH8127> tooth בְּשֵׁ֔ן <WH8127> for tooth יָ֥ד <WH3027> hand בְּיָ֖ד <WH3027> for hand רֶ֥גֶל <WH7272> foot בְּרָֽגֶל׃ <WH7272> for foot ס
